extensionDescription.message: Adds a new text-box to the webpage of the GLS Bank, and copies from there IBAN, amount, subject, etc to the fields of the cash transfer form

inputBoxDescription.message: Paste your invoice here - and click on 'parse' afterwards
inputBoxDescription.description: Description within the input text box

parseButtonText.description: Text of the button to parse the text

verifyInputMessage.message: The content was parsed successfully! Please verify the inserted data...
verifyInputMessage.description: Message which is displayed after parsing succeeds. Reminds that parsing can be error-prone
